sentences.en: She recovered sufficiently to accompany Chou on his tour of Africa in 1964.
sentences.cn: 她康复到足以在周的1964年非洲之旅中伴随他。

sentences.en: The limestone is sufficiently fissured for tree roots to have breached the roof of the cave.
sentences.cn: 石灰岩裂开了足以让树根突破洞顶。

sentences.en: Academics and employers are concerned that students are not sufficiently prepared for college courses.
sentences.cn: 学术界和用人单位都担心学生们对大学课程没有做好足够准备。
